search_results.snippet: Marcus Aurelius (/rilis/; Latin: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus; [notes 1] 26 April 121  17 March 180 AD) was Roman Emperor from 161 to 180. He ruled with Lucius Verus as co-emperor from 161 until Verus' death in 169.
